medal-20000001: Awarded to Commanders who complete all battle challenges during a major limited-time event.
medal-20000002: Awarded to Commanders who achieve outstanding results during a Theater-scale major combat event.
medal-20000003: Awarded to Commanders who achieve outstanding results in Doll and furniture collection.
medal-20000004: Awarded to Commanders who achieve extraordinary results during a carnival event.
medal-20000005: Awarded to Commanders who complete all battle challenges during a limited-time collaboration event.
medal-20000006: Awarded to Commanders who achieve exceptional results with Coalition Units during a major limited-time event.
medal-20000007: Awarded to Commanders who achieve extraordinary results in Luffberry Chess.
medal-20000008: Awarded to Commanders who have completed all battle challenges during the major limited-time event "Fixed Point".
medal-20000009: Awarded to Commanders who achieve outstanding results during the scoring mode of the major limited-time event "Fixed Point".
medal-20000010: Awarded to Commanders who achieved an outstanding score in the 8th Theater Event.
medal-20000011: Awarded to Commanders who delivered exceptional performance in the final stage of the 8th Theater Event.
medal-20000012: Awarded to Commanders who achieved exceptional results in ranking mode "Reign of Chaos+".
medal-20000015: Awarded to Commanders who achieved an outstanding score in the 9th Theater Event.
medal-20000016: Awarded to Commanders who delivered exceptional performance in the final stage of the 9th Theater Event.
medal-20000019: Awarded to Commanders who have cleared all battles in the time-limited event The Glistening Bloom.
